attributes.additional_details: Whatever your views on the above two subjects the Speaker must remain neutral, he has failed. His comments have completely overstepped the mark.
attributes.background: We would like the speaker of the house of commons (John Bercow) to resign or be removed as speaker over his biased and inappropriate comments on democratically elected United States president and his views on Britain leaving the European Union.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Speaker is a personal decision for the Speaker, and is therefore not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.  

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
